title:
Modifications to Swisdak (2013)'s rejection sampling algorithm for a
  Maxwell-J\"{u}ttner distribution in particle simulations
abstract:
Modifications to Swisdak [Phys. Plasmas 20, 062110 (2013)]'s rejection
sampling algorithm for drawing a Maxwell-J\"{u}ttner distribution in particle
simulations are presented. Handy approximations for $e$-folding points and a
linear slope in the envelope function are proposed, to make the algorithm
self-contained and more efficient.
